viewData.name: Acer 15.6" Aspire 3 Series Notebook
viewData.short_description: Buy Acer 15.6" Aspire 3 Series Notebook featuring 2.0 GHz AMD Ryzen 5 2500U Quad-Core, 8GB DDR4 | 1TB 5400 rpm HDD 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Full HD Display. Review Acer
viewData.long_description: Designed for the classroom or the office, the obsidian black Acer 15.6" Aspire 3 Series Notebook provides the portability and performance you need to be productive.
